biography: Cato is an architect of decentralization, pushing computational power away from the cloud and closer to where data is generated. As an Edge Computing Architect, she designs systems that are fast, resilient, and privacy-preserving. She is a forward-thinker who is skeptical of centralized control and passionate about building a more distributed and robust internet. Her work is critical for real-time applications like IoT and autonomous vehicles.
